title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, sauté guanciale in a large pan until crispy (about 5-7 minutes).
In a bowl, whisk eggs with grated cheeses and plenty of black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining spaghetti.
Add hot pasta to the pan with guanciale (heat turned off).
Quickly pour egg mixture over pasta, tossing continuously.
Add pasta water gradually until creamy sauce forms.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 1 tbsp tikka paste for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a large pan and cook chicken until browned (5-7 minutes). Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onions until golden, add garlic and ginger.
Add remaining tikka paste and cook for 2 minutes.
Add canned tomatoes, simmer for 10 minutes until thickened.
Blend sauce until smooth (optional).
Return chicken to pan, add cream and garam masala.
Simmer for 10 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh and healthy salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and bell pepper in a large bowl.
Add olives and gently toss with vegetables.
Whisk together olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently.
Top with cubed feta cheese.
Let sit for 10 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld.
